articles.author: Robert Klemko, Silvia Foster-Frau, Emmanuel Felton
articles.title: For multiracial Americans, Trump’s attack on Harris felt personal - The Washington Post
articles.description: The remarks evoked painful memories for the growing population of Americans who identify as more than one race.
articles.content: When the Rev. Adam Shoemaker heard former president Donald Trump question Vice President Harriss identity as a Black and South Asian American woman this week, he immediately thought back to the dehum… [+10725 chars]
